amendment.description: Amendment in the nature of a substitute sought to authorize $1.5 billion for teacher training; $1.5 billion for class size reduction activities; and allow the Secretary to award grants that include the establishment of technology centers, a clearinghouse for math and science education, and school counseling programs.
amendment.purpose: An amendment no. 12 printed in H.Rept. 106-240 to authorize $1.5 billion for teacher training; $1.5 billion for class size reduction activities; and allows the Secretary to award grants that include the establishment of technology centers, a clearinghouse for math and science education,and school counseling programs.

action.text: Amendment (A012) in the nature of a substitute offered by Mr. Martinez.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Martinez amendment (A012) Failed by recorded vote: 207 - 217 (Roll no. 319).
